job.org: University of Missouri, English Language and Literature department
job.title: Instructor
job.role: Delivered discourses to an inaugural collegiate cohort, fostering intellectual growth.
Facilitated the refinement of scholastic prose amidst aspiring minds.
Evaluated scholarly compositions and academic tasks with fastidious precision.

job.title: Student librarian
job.role: Ensured the restoration of literary tomes to their rightful abodes upon the shelves of knowledge.
Assisted discerning visitors in locating sought-after literary treasures.
